item.title: 美国司法部与西南航空公司就解决航班延误诉讼进行谈判
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，正在与西南航空公司就解决拜登政府指控该航空公司非法运营长期延误航班的诉讼进行谈判。【原文：The Justice Department on Tuesday said it is in talks with Southwest Airlines about potentially resolving a suit filed by the Biden administration accusing the carrier of illegally operating chronically delayed flights.】

item.title: 西南航空客机在二月险些失事事件中与商务客机擦肩而过，距离商务客机不足 200 英尺
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会（National Transportation Safety Board）周二表示，美国西南航空公司一架航班于 2 月 25 日在芝加哥中途机场被迫放弃降落，以险些避免与一架公务机相撞。【原文：A Southwest Airlines flight forced to abort a landing at Chicago Midway Airport on February 25 to narrowly avoid a collision with a business jet was less than 200 feet behind it, the National Transportation Safety Board said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国卫生机构宣布确保婴儿配方奶粉供应质量的计划
item.description: 美国 FDA 和 HHS 于本周二宣布了一系列针对婴儿配方奶粉的行动和倡议，以确保国内婴儿配方奶粉供应的持续质量、安全性、营养充足性和适应性。【原文：The U.S. FDA and HHS announced on Tuesday a set of actions and initiatives focused on infant formula to ensure the ongoing quality, safety, nutritional adequacy and resilience of the domestic infant formula supply.】

item.title: FDA将美敦力栓塞器械召回列为 "最严重 "召回
item.description: 在收到四名患者死亡的报告后，美国食品和药物管理局周二将美敦力公司的栓塞设备召回列为 "最严重 "召回。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Tuesday classified the recall of Medtronic's embolization device as "most serious", following reports of the deaths of four patients.】

item.title: 英国 Hargreaves Lansdown 首席财务官即将离职
item.description: 英国投资平台 Hargreaves Lansdown 周二表示，其财务总监艾米-斯特林（Amy Stirling）将在任职三年后离职。【原文：Hargreaves Lansdown's finance chief Amy Stirling will step down after three years in the role, the British investment platform said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国农业部将在低价环境下开始向农民发放经济援助
item.description: 美国农业部一位官员周二表示，美国农业部将于周三开始接受受商品价格低迷影响的农民申请国会去年通过的经济援助。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture will on Wednesday begin accepting applications from farmers affected by low commodity prices for economic aid passed by Congress last year, an agency official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国卫生与健康服务部撤销将枪支暴力列为公共卫生危机的建议
item.description: 根据特朗普政府的命令，美国卫生与公众服务部（HHS）删除了前美国外科医生 2024 年的咨询报告，该报告称枪支暴力是一场公共卫生危机。【原文：The former U.S. surgeon general's 2024 advisory calling gun violence a public health crisis has been take down by the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) following orders from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 美国首席大法官罗伯茨：特朗普抨击后呼吁弹劾法官是不恰当的
item.description: 美国首席大法官约翰-罗伯茨（John Roberts）周二回应了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对一名主持驱逐权之争的联邦法官的攻击，拒绝接受弹劾是对这位法学家裁决的异议的答案的观点。【原文：U.S. Chief Justice John Roberts responded on Tuesday to President Donald Trump's attacks on a federal judge presiding over a deportation battle, rejecting the idea that impeachment is the answer for a disagreement with the jurist's rulings.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州卫生部门称麻疹病例增至 279 例
item.description: 德克萨斯州卫生部门周二报告了该州 279 例麻疹病例，比上次统计增加了 20 例。【原文：The Texas health department reported 279 measles cases in the state on Tuesday, an increase of 20 cases from its previous count.】

item.title: 美国司法部命令国家安全律师审查肯尼迪事件文件
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封电子邮件称，美国司法部正在命令一些处理敏感国家安全事务的律师紧急审查将于周二公布的前总统约翰-肯尼迪遇刺案的记录。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department is ordering some of its lawyers who handle sensitive national-security matters to urgently review records from the assassination of former President John F. Kennedy that are due be released on Tuesday, according to an email seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普政府在法院下令后恢复 2.45 万名被解雇员工的工作
item.description: 特朗普政府在法庭文件中首次承认解雇了近 2.5 万名新近雇用的工人，并表示在法官裁定解雇这些工人可能违法后，各机构正在努力让他们全部复职。【原文：The Trump administration in court filings has for the first time acknowledged that it fired nearly 25,000 recently hired workers, and said agencies were working to bring all of them back after a judge ruled that their terminations were likely illegal.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份房屋开工强劲反弹
item.description: 2 月份，美国单户住宅建筑业大幅反弹，但关税和劳动力短缺导致的建筑成本上升威胁着经济复苏。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding rebounded sharply in February, but rising construction costs from tariffs and labor shortages threaten the recovery.】

item.title: 特朗普普京的最新动态：美俄领导人将讨论乌克兰停火计划
item.description: 双方领导人将讨论美国提议的 30 天休战。【原文：The leaders will discuss the U.S.-proposed 30-day truce.】

item.title: 特朗普面临向法院解释驱逐委内瑞拉人原因的最后期限
item.description: 特朗普政府将在周二中午的最后期限前提供有关其驱逐委内瑞拉人的详细情况，尽管法官发布了临时驱逐禁令。【原文：The Trump administration faces a midday deadline on Tuesday to provide details about plane loads of Venezuelans it deported despite a judge issuing a temporary ban on removing them.】

item.title: 特朗普将公布 8 万页肯尼迪遇刺案资料
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统计划于本周二公布约 8 万页与 1963 年约翰-肯尼迪总统遇刺事件有关的材料，以兑现他在竞选时做出的承诺，为这起发生在得克萨斯州的震惊事件提供更多的透明度。【原文：President Donald Trump plans to release about 80,000 pages of material related to the 1963 assassination of President John F. Kennedy on Tuesday, seeking to honor his campaign promise to provide more transparency about the shock event in Texas.】

item.title: 独家报道盖茨警告白宫他无法弥补美国全球卫生资金的缺口
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，比尔-盖茨正亲自游说特朗普政府官员继续资助全球范围内的医疗卫生项目，从儿童疫苗接种到艾滋病治疗，并警告说他的基金会不能插手填补缺口。【原文：Bill Gates is personally lobbying Trump administration officials to keep funding health programs worldwide, from childhood vaccination to HIV treatment, and warning that his foundation cannot step in to fill gaps, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 专家称，特朗普政府在打击移民活动中很可能越权行事
item.description: 法律专家说，特朗普政府很可能越权援引了很少适用的法律来为其大肆打击移民的部分行动辩护。【原文：The Trump administration has likely exceeded its authority in invoking rarely applied laws to justify parts of its wide-ranging immigration crackdown, legal experts said.】

item.title: 达美航空公司支线喷气机机翼撞上纽约机场跑道
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局称，达美航空公司一架支线飞机周日晚些时候在纽约拉瓜迪亚机场执行绕场飞行时撞上了跑道。【原文：A Delta Air Lines regional jet struck the runway at New York LaGuardia Airport late on Sunday while executing a go-around, the Federal Aviation Administration said.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州逮捕涉嫌非法堕胎的助产士
item.description: 德克萨斯州总检察长周一表示，该州逮捕了一名助产士，指控其在休斯顿地区提供非法堕胎服务并非法经营诊所网络。【原文：Texas arrested a midwife for allegedly providing illegal abortions and illegally operating a network of clinics in the Houston area, the state attorney general said on Monday.】

item.title: WNBA-斯帕克斯队的布林克对要求男队员参加训练感到不满
item.description: 洛杉矶火花队前锋卡梅隆-布林克（Cameron Brink）说，她在网上看到球队号召男队员参加练习队选拔的消息后感到非常反感。【原文：Los Angeles Sparks forward Cameron Brink said she was revolted by the response she had seen online to a call by the team for male players to try out for the practice squad.】

item.title: 特朗普政府旨在长期加快肉类加工速度
item.description: 特朗普政府周一表示，计划永久性地允许美国家禽和猪肉加工厂更快地运营，这引发了倡导团体对工人健康和食品安全的担忧。【原文：The Trump administration said on Monday it plans to permanently allow U.S. poultry and pork processing plants to operate more quickly, raising concerns among advocacy groups about worker health and food safety.】

item.title: 特朗普任命前顾问弗林为西点军校参观委员会成员
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一任命迈克尔-弗林（Michael Flynn）为美国西点军校（U.S. Military Academy at West Point）访客委员会成员。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday named Michael Flynn, his former national security adviser who challenged the 2020 election results and pushed baseless conspiracy claims, to be on the board of visitors for the U.S. Military Academy at West Point.】

item.title: 特朗普撤销对拜登子女亨特和阿什利的特勤保护
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一撤销了对前总统乔-拜登的子女亨特-拜登和阿什利-拜登的特勤保护。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday revoked secret service protection for former president Joe Biden's children Hunter Biden and Ashley Biden.】

item.title: 哈佛为家庭收入在 20 万美元或以下的学生提供免学费待遇
item.description: 哈佛大学周一表示，将对来自年收入低于 20 万美元家庭的本科生免收学费，还将为年收入低于 10 万美元的学生支付医疗保险、住房和其他费用。【原文：Harvard University said on Monday it would make tuition free for undergraduate students from families earning less than $200,000 a year and would also cover health insurance, housing and other expenses for those earning less than $100,000.】

item.title: 特朗普提名共和航空首席执行官布莱恩-贝德福德担任美国联邦航空局局长
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一在社交媒体上表示，他提名共和航空公司首席执行官布莱恩-贝德福德（Bryan Bedford）担任美国联邦航空管理局局长。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump nominated Republic Airways CEO Bryan Bedford as the administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration, he said on social media on Monday.】

item.title: 工会称美国航空局在法院下令后恢复被解雇员工的工作
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）的一个工会周一表示，在马里兰州的一名联邦法官下令让 132 名于 2 月 14 日被解雇的员工复职后，联邦航空管理局将恢复他们的工作。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration is reinstating 132 employees who were fired on February 14 after a federal judge in Maryland ordered their return, a union said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国民权机构就工作场所 DEI 政策向律师事务所发出警告
item.description: 美国负责执行禁止工作场所歧视法律的机构负责人周一警告 20 家大型律师事务所，它们旨在促进多元化、公平和包容的就业政策可能是非法的。【原文：The head of the U.S. agency that enforces laws banning workplace discrimination on Monday warned 20 major law firms that their employment policies meant to boost diversity, equity and inclusion may be illegal.】

item.title: 特朗普提名美联储理事鲍曼为负责监管的副主席
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在社交媒体上发文称，他提名美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）担任负责监管事务的副主席。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump nominated Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman to be vice chair for supervision, he said in a post on social media.】

item.title: 特朗普称周二将公布约 8 万页肯尼迪档案
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他的政府将于周二公开约 8 万页与前总统约翰-肯尼迪有关的文件。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday his administration will make public around 80,000 pages of files related to former president John F. Kennedy on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国众议院委员会要求提供中国电信黑客攻击记录
item.description: 美国众议院一个委员会周一要求国土安全部交出有关联邦政府应对中国大规模黑客事件的文件。【原文：A U.S. House of Representatives committee on Monday asked the Homeland Security Department to turn over documents on the federal government's response to reported massive Chinese hacking incidents.】
